hero.title: Build travel experiences
hero.description: OnArrival provides the APIs and components to embed flight booking into your app. Ship faster with pre-built UI, unified payments, and real-time webhooks.

codePreview.title: Simple, powerful APIs
codePreview.description: Integrate with a few lines of code. Our JS Bridge handles the complexity of native-PWA communication while you focus on your product.

quickstart.title: Quick start guide
quickstart.description: Get from zero to production in three steps. Our modular architecture lets you integrate incrementally.

steps.title: Get API credentials
steps.desc: Request UAT access and receive your JWT signing keys and S2S API credentials.

steps.title: Implement JS Bridge
steps.desc: Add the OnArrival bridge to handle native events between your app and our PWA.

steps.title: Handle webhooks
steps.desc: Set up server endpoints to receive booking lifecycle events and payment updates.

features.title: Built for developers
features.description: Everything you need to ship travel features without building an OTA from scratch.

items.title: Launch in 30 days
items.description: Pre-built UI components and streamlined integration reduce time-to-market from months to weeks.

items.title: Secure by default
items.description: JWT-based authentication, encrypted S2S communication, and PCI-compliant payment handling.

items.title: Unified payments
items.description: Trigger native payment SDKs, handle refunds, and track transaction states via webhooks.

items.title: Real-time events
items.description: Comprehensive webhook coverage for booking lifecycle, payment status, and inventory updates.

cta.title: Ready to integrate?
cta.description: Start with our UAT environment and go live in weeks, not months. Our team is here to support your integration every step of the way.
